availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Solomon C. Perrin (Covington minister and attorney, Kenton Co Court clerk)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, attorney and county clerk. Harrison County, Kentucky, native. Son of W. C. Perrin. Married to Mary J. Perrin. Father of William Josephus Perrin, Charles Perrin, and Franklin Perrin. Legislator in Harrison County. Judge in Kenton County Court in Kenton County, Kentucky. Owned two enslaved persons in 1850 and 1860. Clerk of Kenton County Court from 1859 to 1862. Attorney in Boone County in 1870.

ab.bibl:
The Biographical Encyclopædia of Kentucky of the Dead and Living Men of the Nineteenth Century (Cincinnati, OH: J. M. Armstrong and Company, 1878), p. 189. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 251. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, 111. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 5, p. 259. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 3. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Union, p. 4.
"Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1859,” in 1860 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 292.
"Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 303-308.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1862,” in 1863 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 24. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1863), 298-306.
